backup-url.name: Backup Server URL
backup-url.description: The URL to which the backup will be sent. <cr>Don't change this unless you know what you are doing!</c> <cy>Refer to the mod page for more information on setting up your own server.</c>

auto-backup.name: Auto Backup on Level Completion
auto-backup.description: Automatically backup your account to the server whenever you complete a level. <cy>May experience slight lag spike upon level completion.</c>
